changeEmail.name: Change email address
changeEmail.description: You want to change your email address for your cape
changeEmail.title: How to change your email address
changeEmail.message:
To change your email address, please email **optifinex@gmail.com** from the original donation email mentioning that you want to change your email address. After that you will be asked to confirm the change.
Once the email is changed you will have 30 days to undo it. From then on it is permanently changed.

If you no longer have access to your donator email, please open a ticket using the "Other" category and provide a proof of purchase such as a PayPal Transaction ID.

If you have no email access or proof of purchace then unfortunately your email is stuck and nothing can be done.

fixEmail.name: Spelt email incorrectly
fixEmail.description: You made a mistake and spelt your email wrong when donating

payment.name: Payment
payment.description: Any issues related to payment issues
payment.title: Unable to provide support
payment.message: Unfortunately, we are unable to help with payment issues. Only Paymentwall can provide support for payment related issues. You can contact them at `support@paymentwall.com`

rp.name: Resource Packs
rp.description: Any issues related to resource packs
rp.message: The support tickets are not for resource pack related issues. Please go to <#425702172219408385> for anything resource pack related.
